pullRequest.title: Add panic statement support
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Add panic statement support for incremental parser.
Fixes: 22176

afterCommit.message: Added panic statement support to incremental parser

commit.message: Added panic statement support to incremental parser

beforeCommit.message: Added panic statement support to incremental parser

afterCommit.message: Added panic statement support to incremental parser

nodes.bodyText: Shall we add all the new changes at the bottom? Applicable to all places?

Shall we add the new changes at the bottom of the block/group, as a practice?
Applicable for other files as well.
Shall we create the public node as well?

Incorrect indentation. Use 4-spaces for indentation.
Please fix in all places.

This parser context used here seems not correct.
Please have a look at parseCallStatementWithCheck() and/or parseAssignmentStmt() for an example.

commit.message: Added visitor and tranform methods for panicstatement
